title: Approve a Department Purchase Request
description: A department head needs to approve a purchase request submitted by a staff member.

tasks.description: Review the pending purchase request, including the item, cost, and justification.
tasks.expected_outcome: The department head reviews the request for new office chairs.

tasks.description: Check the department's remaining budget for the relevant expense category.
tasks.expected_outcome: The department head confirms there are sufficient funds in the 'Office Supplies' budget.

tasks.description: Approve the purchase request, routing it to the procurement department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The department head approves the request, allowing procurement to make the purchase.
